name: FPS Shooter (Prototype)
description:
A Short, 20 minute game for a game-jam

Not finished yet but what's done so far.....
Animated FPS Player
Animated Spider Enemy
Pistol LASER sight (red no target:green valid target)
Player Animations, switch between Idle:Shoot:Reload
Enemy Animations, switch between Walk:Attack:Die
Enemy AI, switches between Patrol:Chase:Attack
Powerup Crates explode when shot.
Poweup Awards include: Gold:Ammo:Health
Enemy requires5 hits to kill (1 shot with Ammo powerup)
Kill all Enemies to release the key
Collecting key makes flood-water rise
Collect the key and find the door to escape
Map (Grid with Red dot showing player position)

To do...
Photorealistic environment
Not all Enemy AI is finished yet (so only a few spiders will chase/attack)
Add score HUD
